duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and optimize all production process variables, ensuring peak reliability and efficiency of production equipment.
Operate, troubleshoot, repair, and maintain oil and gas production equipment.
Acquire and store data related to oil and gas producing operations.
Support Health, Environment, and Safety processes by ensuring compliance with regulations and policies.
Partner with other employees and contractors to ensure peak efficiency of equipment.
Utilize a Computerized Maintenance Management System to create work orders and ensure operational excellence.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate degree in Petroleum or Process Technology preferred)
